title: The Lemonade Affair
description: Oni Press has acquired the middle grade graphic novel The Lemonade Affair, written by Jarod Pratt and illustrated by Jey Odin. The story follows 10-year-old genius Robbie, who opens a state-of-the-art lemonade stand that can make any flavor of lemonade imaginable. However, he finds himself in competition with Daphne, another kid on his block who sells lemonade, and their ensuring Lemonade War might just put the whole city in danger. Publication is slated for 2019.
author: Jarod Pratt
